attacks.name: Disconnect
attacks.effect: Your opponent can't play any Trainer cards (except for Supporter cards) from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Mega Shot
attacks.effect: Discard all Lightning Energy attached to Manectric ex and then choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
